$WmMPID_ルゥ,ch02_15_Lugh_M_Normal,Face|Sure, I'll join you, but if you take that
kind of attitude with other people,
they'll think you aren't friendly.$k$p$WmMPID_レイ,ch02_05_Lleu_M_Normal,Face|They'll think it, huh? ...Fine, fine.
But for now I have to keep you
alive and well, as usual.$k$p$Sbs1000|
